page.title: 06Living In The Area 1
page.content: Top ten likes about the area. 1 Quiet and peaceful. 2 Beautiful countryside. 3 Good public houses. 4 Friendly area. 5 Underdeveloped area. 6 Easy access to towns and motorways. 7 Good schools nearby. 8 Convenient local shops. 9 Good community activities. 10 Flowers and wild life. Top ten dislikes about the area. 1 Poor bus service. 2 High cost of transport. 3 High rates. 4 Isolated in the winter months. 5 Some ugly modern buildings. 6 Very expensive to buy houses. 7 Lack of sports facilities. 8 Speed of traffic on the roads. 9 Strong farming smells. 10 Destruction of trees and hedges.
